text: “The 'Brooklyn Nine-Nine' star and #MeToo silence breaker has been roundly criticized for conflating the movement for Black lives with 'Black supremacy.' He has much to learn,”  writes Cassie da Costa. https://t.co/tbIhQMYNt8

text: Mary Trump is still subject to the order, the judge ruled, but the publisher can release the tell-all as planned https://t.co/0BSww98PHW

text:
"Cops lie, not just often, but with the bravado and confidence of people who know they will neither be caught nor held accountable. And plenty of those lies are made against people working for crap wages and no benefits...," writes Kali Holloway
